rules_text:
Deathtouch
When Venom enters, target creature you don't control gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is Venom's power.
Symbiosis {1}{B} [i](Pay {1}{B} as a sorcery to transform this and attach it to target creature.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](Pay {1}{B} as a sorcery to unattach this. Transform it when it isn't attached.)[/i]
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you may pay {2}{B}{B}. If you do, target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is enchanted creature's power.
